name: javaQuestions
desc: Java assessment which provides Multiple Choice Questions (MCQs) related to Core Java.

questions.description: What is correct syntax for main method of a java class?
questions.explanation: Correct syntax is public static void main(String[] args).

questions.description: What is the size of double variable?
questions.explanation: The double data type is represented by double-precision 64-bit IEEE 754 floating point.
